tuv.seg: <e0>Hint:</e0> the set of file filters for a given project is stored as <f1>project/omegat/filters.xml.</f1>
<e0>提示:</e0>给定项目的分割规则集保存为 <f1>project/omegat/filters.xml.</f1>
<e0>Hint:</e0> the set of segmentation rules for a given project is stored as <f1>project/omegat/segmentation.conf.</f1>
<e0>提示</e0> 给定项目的分割规则集保存为 <f1>project/omegat/segmentation.conf.</f1>
A copy of the changed filters configuration will be stored with the project.
更改配置的过滤器副本将与项目一起存储.
An ignored file or folder:
要忽略的文件或文件夹。被忽略的文件或文件夹：
Auto-propagation of Translations
自动传播翻译
Bear in mind that changing the languages may render the currently used translation memories useless since their language pair may not longer match the new languages.
请记住：更改语言可能会导致当前使用的翻译记忆库变得无用，因为其语言对可能与新语言不匹配。
By default, left justification is used for Left-To-Right (LTR) languages and right justification for Right-To-Left (RTL) languages.
默认情况下，对于从左向右（LTR）的语言的语言使用左对齐，而对于从右向左（RTL）的语言使用右对齐。
Changing segmentation settings may cause some already translated segments to be split or merged.
改变分割规则设置可能导致一些已经译好的片段被分拆或者合并。
Changing this flag does not modify the segmentation of already existing translation memories.
更改此标志不会影响现有翻译记忆库中的片段。
Clic on <g0>Exclusions...</g0> to define the files or folders that will be ignored by <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
点击 <g0>Exclusions...</g0> to define the files or folders that will be ignored by <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
Defines the project-specific external search resources.
定义具体项目的外部搜索资源Defines the project-specific external search resources.
Enable Sentence-level segmentation
启用语句级别分割
External Post-processing Command
外部后处理命令
External Search...
外部搜索...
File Filters...
文件过滤器...
File locations
文件位置
Here you can select different subfolders, for instance the subfolder with source files, subfolder for target files etc.
在这里你可以选择不同的子文件夹，例如包含原文文件的子文件夹、译文文件的子文件夹等。
If the Auto-propagation check box is not checked, the segments with alternative translations are left untranslated until the user has decided which translation is to be used.
如果未勾选自动传播复选框，则含有替代译文的片段会保持未译状态直到用户决定使用哪种译文。

If you decide mid-translation to switch from sentence to paragraph translation, the internal translation memory of the project will not be changed (OmegaT may upgrade old translation memories that did not use sentence segmentation, but not vice versa), but OmegaT will attempt to create paragraph fuzzy matches by gluing together existing sentence translations.
如果您在翻译中途决定从语句翻译切换至段落翻译，项目的内部翻译记忆库不会更改（OmegaT 可能会升级不使用语句分割的旧翻译记忆库，但反之则不然），但 OmegaT 会尝试通过组合现有的句子翻译来创建段落模糊匹配。
If you enter names of folders that do not exist yet, <a0>OmegaT</a0> creates them for you.
如果输入的文件夹名称尚不存在，<a0>OmegaT</a0> 会为您创建新的文件夹.
In a similar fashion as above the user can create project-specific File filters, which will be stored together with the project and will be valid for the current project only.
同上述操作相同，用户可为项目创建专用的分割规则，更改后的过滤器配置的副本会随同项目一起存储，且仅针对该项目有效。

In case there are non-unique segments in source documents, the Auto-propagation check box offers the user the following two possibilities as regards automatic translation: if checked, the first translated segment will be assumed as the default translation and its target text will be automatically used for later hits during the translation process.
如果原文文档中包含非独特片段，自动传播翻译复选框为用户提供了下面两种自动翻译的可能性：如果勾选，则第一个被翻译的片段将假定为默认翻译，其译文文本在翻译过程中会自动用于后继命中。
In case you decide to modify project folders, keep in mind that this will not move existing files from old folders to the new location.
如果你决定修改项目的文件夹，要记住这并不会将现有文件从旧文件夹移动到新位置。
In some seldom cases the alternative, i.e. segmenting by paragraphs, may be preferred.
在一些少见情况下，替代方案，即按段落分割，可能会更好。
In the Exclusion patterns dialog, it is possible to Add or Remove a pattern, or edit one by selecting a line and pressing F2.
在排除模式对话框中，可以添加或删除模式，也可以通过选定一行并按 F2 来编辑。可以按
It can also be used in all the input fields found in <a7>OmegaT</a7> - in the search window, for segmentation rules etc.
中出现的所有输入字段中使用——搜索窗口中、分割规则等。
It can be used separately for all three panes (Editor, Fuzzy Matches and Glossary) by clicking on the pane and toggling the display mode.
通过点击窗格并切换显示模式，它可以单独用于所有三个窗格（编辑器、模糊匹配和词汇表）。
It is possible to use wildcards, using the <u0>ant syntax</u0>.
允许使用通配符 <u0>ant syntax</u0>.
Justification of source and target segments depends upon the project languages.
原文与译文片段的对齐方式取决于项目的语言。
Languages
语言
Mac OS X users, note: use <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> shortcut and <e4>not </e4>cmd+Ctrl+O.
对于 Mac OS X 用户，请注意：使用
Manage Right-To-Left languages
驾驭从右向左的语言
Mistranslated segments can of course be corrected later manually using <g0>Create Alternative Translation</g0>.
当然，错译片段之后可以手动纠正。
Mixing RTL and LTR strings in segments
在片段中混合从右向左和从左向右字符串
Non-visible formatting (i.e., which doesn't appear as tags in the OmegaT editor) is retained in target documents.
不可见的格式信息（即不会在 OmegaT 编辑器中显示为标签的那些）在译文文档中会得已保留。
Note that in the menu <g2>Options->File Filters</g2>, the global user filters are changed, not the project filters.
注意在菜单中 <g2>选项->文件过滤器</g2>, the global user filters are changed, not the project filters.
Options
选项
Project Properties
项目属性
Remove Tags
删除标签
Repository Mapping...
存储库映射...
See <l1>Segmentation Setup preferences</l1> for more information on segmentation rules.
见 <l1>分割设置首选项</l1>查询与细分规则相关的更多信息
See <l3>File Filters preferences</l3> for more on the subject.
见 <l3>文件过滤器首选项</l3> 获取更多关于该主题的信息.
Segmentation...
片段分割...
The <k4> <k5>Shift</k5> <k6>Ctrl</k6> <k7>O</k7> </k4> toggle has three states:
有三种切换状态：
The display mode of the translated documents must be modified within the application (such as Microsoft Word) commonly used to display or modify them (check the relevant manuals for details).
中创建的译文文档的显示模式没有任何影响。译文文档的显示模式必须在通常用于显示或修改它的应用程序（诸如 Microsoft Word）中修改（详细信息请查看相关手册）。
The new set of rules will be stored together with the project and will not interfere with the general set of segmentation rules.
新的规则集将与项目一起存储，不会干扰到通用的分割规则集。
The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
处理原文文件的方式。语句级分割是分割原文的主要方式，所以正常情况下应该选中该复选框。
The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects.
分割规则通常适用于所有项目。
The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
分割规则设置只影响
The user, however, may need to generate a set of rules, specific to the project in question.
但是，用户可能需要生成一组所讨论项目专用的规则。
This area allows entering an external post-processing command (for instance, a script to rename files) that will be applied each time Create Translated Documents is used.
此区域允许输入一个在每次使用“创建译文文档”之后都会应用的外部后处理命令（例如，用于重命名文件的脚本）。
This dialog is accessible by selecting <m0> <g1>Project</g1> <g2>Properties...</g2> </m0>
此对话框可通过选择
This external command cannot include "pipes", etc., which is why calling a script is recommended.
这个外部命令不能包含“管道”等，因此建议调用一个脚本。

This is especially useful when dealing with texts where inline formatting is not really useful (e.g., OCRed PDF, bad converted .odt or .docx, etc.) In a normal case it should always be possible to open the target documents, as only inline tags are removed.
这在处理内联格式并不真正有用的文本（如 OCRed PDF、转换不良的 .odt 或 .docx 等）时特别有用。正常情况下译文文档应当都能打开，因为只移除了内联标签。.
This will effectively return them to the "untranslated" status, as they will no longer match segments recorded in the project memory, even though their original translation is still there.
这实际上会让它们回到“未译”状态，因为它们和记录在翻译记忆库中的片段不再匹配，虽然它们的原始翻译依然存在。
To create a project-specific set of file filters, click on the <g0>File filter ... </g0>button, then activate <g1>Enable project specific filters</g1> check box in the window that opens.
为创建具体项目的分割规则集，点击 <g0>文件过滤器... </g0>按钮，然后点击激活 <g1>选中项目具体文件过滤器</g1>当前窗口中的复选框.
To delete project specific file filters, uncheck the check box.
要删除项目专用的分割规则，取消勾选此复选框。
To delete project specific segmentation rules, uncheck the check box.
要删除项目专用的分割规则，取消勾选此复选框。
Tokenizers corresponding to the selected languages are displayed.
会显示所选语言所对应的分词器。
Use this button to open a dialog, activate the check box <g0>Project specific segmentation rules</g0>, then proceed to adjust the segmentation rules as desired.
用此按钮打开对话框，激活复选框，然后根据需要继续调整分割规则。
Using <k2> <k3>Shift</k3> <k4>Ctrl</k4> <k5>O</k5> </k2> causes both text input and display in <a6>OmegaT</a6> to change.
使用 <k2> <k3>Shift</k3> <k4>Ctrl</k4> <k5>O</k5> </k2> 会改变文本的输入与显示方式.
Using the RTL mode in <a0>OmegaT</a0> has no influence whatsoever on the display mode of the translated documents created in <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
在OmegaT中使用 RTL 模式不会影响翻译后的文档的显示模式。
When enabled, all the formatting tags are removed from source segments.
启用后，将从原文片段中移除所有格式化标签。
When working on a team project, this window allows you to define the mapping between remote folders and local folders (see examples <l0>here</l0>).
在处理团队项目时，此窗口允许您定义远程文件夹和本地文件夹之间的映射（示例参见.
You can either enter the source and target languages by hand or use the drop down menus.
您可以手动输入或者通过下拉菜单选择原文与译文语言。.
You can toggle between different display modes by pressing <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> (this is the letter O and not the numeral 0).
你可以通过按 <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>O</k3> </k0> (注意是字母O而不是数字0).
default justification, that is as defined by the language
默认对齐，由语言定义
is not copied in /target folder during the translated files creation process.
在译文文件创建过程中不会被复制到 /target 文件夹中。
is not displayed in the Editor pane,
不会显示在编辑器窗格中、
is not taken into account in statistics,
不会纳入统计、
left justification
左对齐
right justification
右对齐
